author: wn.com
title: The Welsh public sector needs to shift its focus to maintain the independence of older ...
text: ( Source : Wales Audit Office ) The leadership and strategies of Councils in Wales are failing to always recognise the important role that non health and social care services play in supporting and sustaining the independence of older people,
